overview: A DVD collection of every Cocteau Twins promotional video plus some bonus features.  (1) Pearly Dewdrops' Drops  (2) Aikea-Guinea  (3) Pink Orange Red  (4) Love's Easy Tears  (5) Crushed  (6) Carolyn's Fingers  (7) Cico Buff  (8) Iceblink Luck  (9) Heaven or Las Vegas  (10) Evangeline  (11) Bluebeard  (12) Tishbite  RILKEAN DREAMS (directed by Tomato)  (13) Prelude  (14) Rilkean Heart  (15) A Capella Interlude  (16) Half-Gifts  (17) Epilogue  EXTRAS  (18) This Mortal Coil - Song To The Siren  (19) Massive Attack - Teardrop (Live)
title: Cocteau Twins – Tishbites
